rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: spacious entrance hall leading to the living area, designed with minimal decor and a neutral color palette. Features: a small waiting area, built-in storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side to maximize daylight and view of the garden. Incorporates minimalist furniture with an emphasis on open space.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room, featuring minimalistic design and large windows for natural light. Vastu-compliant layout with the dining table positioned in the center.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with open shelving, integrated appliances and ample storage space. Positioned away from main living spaces to maintain cleanliness and privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A quiet guest room with built-in seating, minimal decor and large windows for ventilation. Adheres to Vastu principles with east-facing window design.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.description: Another guest room designed similarly to Guest Room 1, ensuring privacy and adequate natural light. Also Vastu-compliant with east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Primary bathroom associated with the living area, designed for convenience and minimal water usage. Includes essential fixtures.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading to the house, built in a minimalist style with subtle design elements and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Rear exit providing access to the garden area, ensuring seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room that capture the natural light from the west-facing garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows providing a serene view of the garden. Includes an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Well-lit child bedroom with east-facing windows for optimal morning light, designed with minimal decor to encourage calmness.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another child bedroom similar to Child Bedroom 1, ensuring sufficient space and privacy for each occupant.

rooms.name: Bathroom

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window in master bedroom ensuring a harmonious view of the garden. Vastu principles considered by aligning the room with cardinal directions.

rooms.name: Rooftop Garden
rooms.description: Large garden area on the rooftop providing a communal space for relaxation, outdoor activities and fresh air. Designed with minimalist landscaping and integrated seating areas.
